item.description:
McKenzie's Restaurant & Bar
96 Main Street, Nashua, NH (edit map)
Lucky to have Jon Finn and Dave Shaheen, both accomplished performers in their own right, together as their Duo, performing at cozy new venue. Scottish themed pub with nice bar, good food [well, my stuffed red pepper was delish] cozy sofa seating upfront neat stage. Great waitstaff. 2 prior multi-group Meetups at Nashua venue nearby were a success! 15 Members attended the 1st, and 28! to the second. The guys sounded GREAT on their system last night. Acoustic and electric guitars, and beautiful harmonies!
Come early for seating, and a bite! say 7-7:30pm
We got great reviews , and verbal kudos ... "Great Meetup!"
They have website and videos online. Check 'em out! This will be cross-posted  w/several groups.  **Co-hosted by Eva and Patricia

Please remember to take responsibility for your own tab, seperate checks, tip your servers ;-)))

Remember to drink and drive responsible, host carries no liability.                         Amy (cover version)
When Will I Be Loved?

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Classic Rock and Acoustic w/ Jon and Dave Duo at McKenzie's Nashua, NH
